archimate:BusinessEvent.name: ADV002 Unauthorised access to legitimate authentication credentials
archimate:BusinessEvent.documentation:
The threat obtains unauthorised access to legitimate authentication credentials and uses these to gain access to an organisation’s information systems.
Assessment guidance: Authentication information can be obtained in numerous ways, including: - leak of authentication information - insecure storage of authentication information - conducting brute force login attempts/password guessing attacks.
The threat may combine this information with exploits including: - exploiting unencrypted or poorly encrypted information - determining ‘weak’ passwords by valid system users.
